description: Number of prime factors of Fermat number F(n).
comments: F(12) has 6 known factors with C1133 remaining. [Updated by _Walter Nissen_, Apr 02 2010]F(13) has 4 known factors with C2391 remaining.F(14) has one known factor with C4880 remaining. [Updated by Matt C. Anderson, Feb 14 2010]
